Looking at the code (but not testing), the load-cookies ought to happen 
when BdbCookieStorage's initialTasks (as inherited from its superclass) 
is called. The save-cookies is triggered from FetchHTTP's finalTasks, so 
should happen when a crawl ends cleanly.

If your runs indicate that isn't happening, please file a bug in JIRA.

- Gordon @ IA

rogercaplan wrote:
> Do the cookie-storage:load-cookies-from-file and
> cookie-storage:save-cookies-to-file settings work properly in 2.0.2?
> As far as I can tell the cookie loading/saving code never gets called,
> at least with BdbCookieStorage.
